subsection_content: The sinus system includes sinuses on both sides: jaw, ethmoid, frontal, sphenoid. Polysinusitis is an inflammation and swelling of the epithelial mucosa lining the sinuses and at least two or more sinuses are inflamed. Polysinusitis occurs due to an inflammatory reaction, allergy or infection caused by bacteria, viruses or fungi.
subsection_title: viem da xoang.json. What disease is polysinusitis?
subsection_data:
viem da xoang.json. What disease is polysinusitis?
The sinus system includes sinuses on both sides: jaw, ethmoid, frontal, sphenoid. Polysinusitis is an inflammation and swelling of the epithelial mucosa lining the sinuses and at least two or more sinuses are inflamed. Polysinusitis occurs due to an inflammatory reaction, allergy or infection caused by bacteria, viruses or fungi.
